definitions.definition: An Englishman ; a Briton ; a person of British descent .
definitions.label_groups: Australia , New Zealand , South Africa , mildly derogatory slang

definitions.definition: A cocktail containing pomegranate juice and vodka .

main_definition: ( Australia , New Zealand , South Africa , mildly derogatory slang ) An Englishman ; a Briton ; a person of British descent .
secondary_definitions: ( cocktail ) A cocktail containing pomegranate juice and vodka .
